definitions: A traditional story sometimes popularly regarded as historical but unauthenticated.
An extremely famous or notorious person, especially in a particular field.
A story about a mythical or supernatural being or event.
An inscription, especially on a coin or medal.
A key to the symbols used on a map or chart.
examples: He became a legend in his own lifetime.
The map legend explained the symbols.
The legend on the ancient coin was hard to read.
